articles.description: Listen to live radio commentary and follow text updates from the first practice & sprint qualifying sessions at the Miami Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 practice LIVE: Miami Grand Prix 2025 times, results, radio and updates

articles.description: Gregg Popovich steps down from his position as head coach of the San Antonio Spurs after 29 seasons with the team.
articles.title: Popovich steps down as Spurs coach after 29 years

articles.description: England selector Luke Wright says "runs are the currency" as a decision looms over the batting line-up for marquee series against India and Australia later this year.
articles.title: England team selection: 'Runs the currency' for Zak Crawley and Ollie Pope as Jacob Bethell decision looms

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says midfielder Jorginho is "recovering well" from a lung injury and might play again this season.
articles.title: Jorginho: Arsenal midfielder likely to feature this season after lung injury

articles.description: Dissecting Rory McIlroy's performance on the  'Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon' - including a chipping contest and his Masters doubts.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: Masters champion's appearance on Jimmy Fallon Show

articles.description: Celtic winger Jota will be sidelined for between six to nine months through injury, manager Brendan Rodgers has confirmed.
articles.title: Celtic's Jota ruled out for up to nine months

articles.description: Zhao Xintong dominates against seven-time winner Ronnie O'Sullivan in their World Championship semi-final, as Mark Williams and Judd Trump reach all square.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025: Zhao Xintong leads Ronnie O'Sullivan, Judd Trump and Mark Williams level

articles.description: The odds are looking favourable for a sixth all-English European final, after Manchester United and Tottenham both win semi-final first legs on Thursday.
articles.title: Europa League: Manchester United to meet Tottenham in all-English final?

articles.description: Essex bowler Sam Cook is in line for an England debut after being named in the squad for the one-off Test against Zimbabwe at Trent Bridge.
articles.title: Sam Cook in line for England debut after being named in squad for Zimbabwe Test

articles.description: Exeter head coach Rob Hunter leaves the club by mutual consent, after a club-record loss at Gloucester.
articles.title: Rob Hunter: Exeter Chiefs head coach leaves after record defeat
